channel.title: Fixing NPC Animations?
channel.description: Okay, so I'm working on a very important project for a while and I start to notice that most of the NPC's on my server glitch to hell when you kill them, or when they die. Throughout my whole server coding experience I've never changed NPC animations, and for some reason I could never find out how. I've tried different things but they never worked right. Can someone lead me to a tutorial or atleast give me an idea on how to fix ALL NPC glitching for when they die? I appreciate it very much

item.title: Fixing NPC Animations?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Torax Owner Torax
item.description:
@Owner_Torax wrote:

Okay, so I’m working on a very important project for a while and I start to notice that most of the NPC’s on my server glitch to hell when you kill them, or when they die. Throughout my whole server coding experience I’ve never changed NPC animations, and for some reason I could never find out how. I’ve tried different things but they never worked right. Can someone lead me to a tutorial or atleast give me an idea on how to fix ALL NPC glitching for when they die? I appreciate it very much

Read full topic
